document.full_text: leading israeli authors have joined a campaign against the deportation of a palestinian book shop owner, whose business in east jerusalem has become a hub for diplomats, artists and academics from across the world.
document.title: israelis defend threatened palestinian bookseller
lines_and_colors: leading israeli authors have joined a campaign against the deportation of a palestinian book shop owner, whose business in east jerusalem has become a hub for diplomats, artists and academics from across the world.
